apex-core_7bbb4cf.message: APEXCORE-362 - NPE in StreamingContainerManager. Fixed race condition between the thread that insert into endWindowStatsOperatorMap and the thread that removes entries when  endWindowStatsOperatorMap exceeds 1000 entries.

apex-core_7dd2d50.message: don't throw NPE if classpath is not present

apex-core_bd67f3d.message: SPOI-3752 #comment Fixed NPE due to null streamcodec by setting non serializing streamcodec

apex-core_c6b3a92.message: APEXCORE-363 - NPE in StreamingContainerManager. Skip null in the statistics list in case it was inserted as a result of incorrect CircularBuffer usage in the OperatorContext.

file.patch:
@@ -12,10 +12,13 @@ stram.node.node2.template=nt1
 stram.node.inputNode.classname=com.malhartech.stram.NumberGeneratorInputAdapter
 stram.node.inputNode.maxTuples=10
 
+stram.node.httpOut.classname=com.malhartech.lib.io.HttpOutputNode
+stram.node.httpOut.resourceUrl=http://localhost:9999/resourcecontext
+
 stram.stream.input1.source=inputNode.outputPort
 stram.stream.input1.sinks=node1.input1
 stram.stream.input1.template=streamtempl1
 
 stram.stream.n1n2.source=node1.output1
-stram.stream.n1n2.sinks=node2.input1
+stram.stream.n1n2.sinks=node2.input1,httpOut.input
 stram.stream.n1n2.template=streamtempl1
